McMd::McPairPotentialImpl< Interaction > Class Template Reference
Pair Potentials

Detailed Description

template<class Interaction>
class McMd::McPairPotentialImpl< Interaction >

Implementation template for an McPairPotential.

Member Function Documentation

template<class Interaction >
void McMd::McPairPotentialImpl< Interaction >::readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Reads maxBoundary and pair potential Interaction blocks.

This method reads the maxBoundary and Interaction parameter blocks, and then allocates memory for an internal CellList. It passes simulation().nAtomType() as an argument Interaction::setNAtomType() before calling Interaction::readParam().

Reimplemented from Util::ParamComposite.
